mapper.select: SELECT date, user_id, user_name, open_hope, role, confirmed, remarks FROM selected_date WHERE date BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY date, user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO selected_date (date, user_id, user_name, open_hope, role, confirmed, remarks) VALUES (#{date}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{openHope}, #{role}, COALESCE(#{confirmed}, 'N'), #{remarks}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE user_name = VALUES(user_name), open_hope = VALUES(open_hope), role = VALUES(role), remarks = VALUES(remarks)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM selected_date WHERE date = #{date} AND user_id = #{userId}
